channel.title: Yet Another PSA
channel.description:
[url='https://steamcommunity.com/groups/messagetovalve']Message To Valve Steam Group.[/url]
I'm just trying to get the word out here. [quote] Join us for a huge group activity, next Saturday (February 4th) at 11:00AM - 11: 30AM PDT (-8GMT) where we will be playing Half-Life 2.
Why are we doing this? It will be a fun way to rally together, put Half-Life back in the spotlight and draw more people to our cause. We are not asking or demanding for anything; it will simply be a huge group of Half-Life fans playing one of the best games ever made. Who knows, maybe Half-Life 2 will even reach the top ten games played for that day.
There will be more information posted later this week. I am looking forward to an exciting day with thousands of Half-Life fans. :slight_smile:
In order to find the correct time for your region, check the goup event here:
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/groups/messagetovalve/events/1424497266471760206[/url]
(special thanks to smash, mimaz and spitfire for their hard work) [/quote] I'll probably participate, but not in that 30 minute period.
What about you?

item.title: Yet Another PSA
item.dc:creator: jindafrom
item.description:
Message To Valve Steam Group.

I’m just trying to get the word out here.

Join us for a huge group activity, next Saturday (February 4th) at 11:00AM - 11: 30AM PDT (-8GMT) where we will be playing Half-Life 2.

Why are we doing this? It will be a fun way to rally together, put Half-Life back in the spotlight and draw more people to our cause. We are not asking or demanding for anything; it will simply be a huge group of Half-Life fans playing one of the best games ever made. Who knows, maybe Half-Life 2 will even reach the top ten games played for that day.

There will be more information posted later this week. I am looking forward to an exciting day with thousands of Half-Life fans.

In order to find the correct time for your region, check the goup event here:

https://steamcommunity.com/groups/messagetovalve/events/1424497266471760206

(special thanks to smash, mimaz and spitfire for their hard work)

I’ll probably participate, but not in that 30 minute period.

What about you?

Read full topic
